description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

	Investigations:

SLIDESNET-33249      Failed to load Aspose.Slides when embedded in application

	Bugs:

 SLIDESNET-14226      Table Height/Width not working in PPTX
SLIDESNET-29130      Generated presentation getting corrupted when opened in PP 2010 or PP 2011 on MAC
SLIDESNET-32748      Generated PDF is corrupted
SLIDESNET-33281      Wrong text bullets positioning in two columns
SLIDESNET-33298      AddEmptySlide with specified custom layout that has a placeholder failed
SLIDESNET-33337      Issue with slides Thumbnails for PPT
SLIDESNET-33367      The spacing between bullets and text is bigger than must be
SLIDESNET-33415      Charts are exported incorrectly into HTML
SLIDESNET-33465      NullReferenceException on accessing presentation
SLIDESNET-33474      Aspose.Slides generated presentation crashes PowerPoint 2010 when Labels Text properties are changed
SLIDESNET-33499      ArgumentException on accessing presentation
SLIDESNET-33500      Presentation is corrupted after open/write operations
SLIDESNET-33508      Aspose.Slides hangs on cloning PPT using SlidesEx class
SLIDESNET-33572      NullReferenceException while exporting ppt to pdf
SLIDESNET-33591      The chart grid lines are missing in cloned presentation
SLIDESNET-33605      PPT file gets corrupted by saving it
SLIDESNET-33609      Repairing of acquiring of paragraph's style for autoshape in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-33634      The date metacharacter is not getting replaced in text frame text
SLIDESNET-33639      OleObjectFrameEx.Image is obsolete
SLIDESNET-33642      The bullets characters are improperly rendered in cloned presentation
SLIDESNET-33643      Failed to load Aspose.Slides namespace in .NET 4 applications
SLIDESNET-33658      Infinite loop when saving a PresentationEx
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
